hero.top: The complete personality and intelligence development app.
hero.title: KidzLife: Grow Their IQ, EQ, and SQ.

moodCheck.title: AI Live Session
moodCheck.greeting: Hi Max! I'm happy to see you again. Before we start, tell me, how do you feel today?

mathChallenge.instructions: Ali, let's try this together. Look at this math problem. Imagine your own magic ball is holding all the distractions. Focus only on the numbers. Can you solve it?
